codex_144_99.description: Unified mapping of all traditions into Codex 144:99 - 144 nodes, 99 depths/rooms, all connected through psychomagic and angel tech

soyga.description: Soyga - 36 tables of planetary magic, connected to Codex nodes
soyga.mapping: Soyga tables map to Codex nodes through planetary correspondences
soyga.codex_connection: Nodes map to Soyga tables via planetary gates

iching.description: I Ching - 64 hexagrams, connected to Codex nodes and depths
iching.mapping: 64 hexagrams map to Codex nodes (144 nodes = 64 hexagrams Ã— 2.25, with overlap)
iching.codex_connection: Nodes 0-63 map directly to hexagrams, nodes 64-143 map to hexagram combinations

kabbalah.description: Kabbalah - Tree of Life (10 Sephiroth + 22 Paths = 32), connected to Codex
kabbalah.mapping: 10 Sephiroth + 22 Paths = 32, maps to Codex nodes through gates and arcana
kabbalah.codex_connection: Sephiroth map to gates, Paths map to Major Arcana (22), all connect to nodes

evolutionary_astrology.description: Evolutionary Astrology - Soul evolution through planetary nodes, connected to Codex
evolutionary_astrology.mapping: Planetary nodes (North/South) map to Codex nodes through consciousness levels
evolutionary_astrology.codex_connection: Planetary nodes map to consciousness levels (0-21), which map to nodes

solfeggio.description: Solfeggio Frequencies - 9 sacred frequencies, connected to Codex consciousness levels

solfeggio.codex_connection: Frequencies map to consciousness levels (0-21), which map to nodes and depths

fractal_math.description: Fractal Mathematics - Mandelbrot, Julia sets, connected to Codex sacred geometry
fractal_math.mapping: Fractal patterns map to Codex nodes through sacred geometry ratios
fractal_math.codex_connection: Fractal iterations map to node progressions, depths map to fractal layers

fusion_kink.description: Fusion Kink - 78-card tarot system mirroring Codex 144:99
fusion_kink.mapping: 78 cards map to Codex nodes through arcana and correspondences
fusion_kink.codex_connection: Major Arcana (22) + Minor Arcana (56) = 78, maps to nodes and depths
